name: McCreery Aviation Co., Inc.
about: McCreery Aviation Co., Inc., located in McAllen, Texas, is a renowned flight school and full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO) with over 78 years of experience. Our flight academy offers comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Flight Instructor certifications. We provide an introductory flight in a 4-seat Cessna 172, allowing prospective students to experience a sample lesson with a certified instructor. In addition to flight training, McCreery Aviation offers a range of services including fuel and hangar facilities, aircraft maintenance, avionics, and parts. Our air charter service allows travelers to fly on their own schedule to destinations closer to their final ground destination. With a commitment to excellence and safety, McCreery Aviation is dedicated to providing top-notch aviation services and training.
